entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
